author: Freya McClements
title: Coronavirus victim’s daughter appeals for people to ‘value life and stay indoors’
description: Breda Doherty says relatives cannot see her mother in her coffin after death from virus
content:
The daughter of an 82-year-old woman who died from coronavirus in Northern Ireland on Monday has made an emotional appeal to the public to wise up and stay indoors to save lives. 
If you value life you will stay in, and do what youve been asked, please, said… [+2267 chars]
